name: chrome-extension-mv3-react-typescript
description: A chrome extension template build with Manifest v3, React 18, TypeScript 4 and Webpack 5.

scripts.start:dev: npx webpack serve --config webpack.config --env development --env goal=dev --env port=3000
scripts.start:test: npx webpack serve --config webpack.config --env development --env goal=test --env port=3000
scripts.start:prod: npx webpack serve --config webpack.config --env production --env goal=prod --env port=3000
scripts.start:release: npx webpack serve --config webpack.config --env production --env goal=prod --env port=3000
scripts.zip:all: npm run zip:dev && npm run zip:test && npm run zip:prod && npm run zip:release
scripts.zip:dev: npx webpack --config webpack.config --env development --env goal=dev --env zip --env zipName=draft_release_dev
scripts.zip:test: npx webpack --config webpack.config --env development --env goal=test --env zip --env zipName=draft_release_test
scripts.zip:prod: npx webpack --config webpack.config --env production --env goal=prod --env zip --env zipName=draft_release_prod
scripts.zip:release: npx webpack --config webpack.config --env production --env goal=prod --env zip --env zipName=official_release
scripts.debug:webserver: npx webpack serve --config webpack.config.js --stats-error-details --env development --env goal=dev --env port=3000
